rules_text:
When this creature enters, create an Aether token. [i](It's an enchantment with “Sacrifice two Aether: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Flow – {7}, Sacrifice seven nonland permanents: Search your library for a permanent card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. [i](Each creature you tap while activating this pays for {1}.)[/i]
